On Fri, 2004-02-27 at 14:24, George Armhold wrote:
> Does anyone have a sug=
gestion for how to test servlets that expect
> multipart/form-data?  I'm tr=
ying to TDD a file submission servlet.
> I'm looking through httpunit/servl=
etunit, but don't see how to create
> a WebRequest that is multipart.  It l=
ooks like I can create a web page
> that contains a form which points to my=
 servlet, and then submit on
> that, but that seems kind of convoluted.  Th=
ere must be a better way.
> Any pointers will be appreciated, thanks.

FWIW=
: This is what I did...

Note: The 'goToPage(...)' methods are home brewed =
to deal with our
specific navigation issues.  You essentially just need to =
call
getResponse(WebRequest) on a WebConversation (or something like that).=


=3Djason

CODE:

est(localhost() + "/" + forms[1].getAction());
        request.setMimeEncod=
ed(true);
        request.setParameter("file", new UploadFileSpec[]{new

oadFileSpec(file)});

ction());

le.deleteOnExit();
